_sText:
surf_treasurehunt is a t1 lineair surf map.

It was originally an attempt to make a lineair surf give different paths/skips, and this has been reflected in the skips that are possible.

It took about a month worth of time working at the map, originally sticking with self-crafted ramps in Hammer to details and environment, switching to Blender ramps and overall making the map more enjoyable to surf by adding a ton of skips. While I might not be a good visual designer, I do priorize making the surf enjoyable and as smooth as possible. I learned a lot of using Blender and implemented some of those elements in the map. The main map contains 0 teleport triggers, same for the bonusses.

In addition it has 2 bonuses: One is a previous sketch of the map, focusing around a single skip.

The second one is an mix of surf_treespam and surf_royal made easy.

Triggers have been added in order to make the starting/end zones.

Map tested and played with default Momentum Mod values, so unless you want to get launched keep the default values.
Credits:

Kompile (https://www.youtube.com/user/SDKompile) for making a video about creating ramps in Blender and the Blender plugin SURGE which allows for very simple Blender ramp creation.

Momentum Mod community for any questions regarding Source Hammer I had.

surf_sluice for inspiration for the sewer part

surf_treespam and surf_royal for bonus 2

This map will be ported to CS:GO soon, but since it was developed in CSS/Momentum Mod this is the main release.
